titles: Sir Thomas Fairfax knight generall of the forces raised by the Parliament. Suffer the bearer hereof [blank] who was in the city and garrison of Oxford, at the the surrender thereof, and is to have the full benefit of the articles agreed unto upon the surrender  ...
author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
notes: Title from heading and first lines of text.
Place of publication and printer's name from Wing.
Dated at end: Given under my hand and seale the [blank] day of [blank] 1646.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: England and Wales. --  Army. --  Early works to 1800.
